name: Tower Inferno
description:
See how many floors you can stack in this hot new game to stay ahead of the roaring flames!
Stack this towering inferno as high as you can before it burns and falls over! 
The higher you build, the more stars you earn that you can use to unlock new colorful worlds.
Choose from Pirate, Viking and Sci-Fi plus many more worlds to build in.
Test your brain and reflexes in this fiery stacking puzzle!
